alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Gila County southeast of Payson through 215 PM MST... At 159 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Young, or 17 miles southeast of Payson, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph, up to half inch hail, and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Gila County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
